playersNamesScreen.title: Players
playersNamesScreen.warningEmptyList: Player names list is empty or invalid.
playersNamesScreen.messagePlayerNameMissed: You have not entered a name for Player
playersNamesScreen.errorConfirmingPlayers: Error occurred while confirming players. Please try again.

scanningIntroductionScreen.title: Scanning Introduction
scanningIntroductionScreen.firstMessage: On the next screens the narrator of the game should individually present a scan code to each one of the players.
scanningIntroductionScreen.secondMessage: With it, the players will be able to individually view their roles in the game, along with further explanations if needed.

playersScanScreen.title: Role of Each Player
playersScanScreen.subtitle: Swipe to let each player scan their QR code with their phone
playersScanScreen.cardDescription: , scan this code and view your role in the game through your phone.

viewRolesScreen.title: Get Ready for the First Night
viewRolesScreen.subtitle: As the operator, you will get the village ready for their first night. View each player's role below.

nightTimeScreen.title: Night Time
nightTimeScreen.subtitle: Guide the village through the night. Wake up each role displayed below, even if the role is killed through the nights. Here are the roles to wake up:

UIWerewolf.title: Werewolf Role
UIWerewolf.description: - Wake up the Werewolves and let them decide collectively who to eliminate this night.

UISeer.title: Seer Role
UISeer.description: - Wake up the Seer and let them choose someone from the village. You will let the Seer know if the chosen person is a good or bad role.

UIDoctor.doctorRoleDescription: - Wake up the Doctor and let them choose a person to protect, including themselves. Cannot repeat the same person 2 times in a row.
UIDoctor.choosePlayerDescription: Select one player to be protected by the Doctor

UIBodyguard.bodyguardRoleDescription: Wake up the Bodyguard. He will choose a player through the first night to protect for the rest of the game. If this player gets attacked twice, the Bodyguard will die instead of them.

UIPriest.priestRoleDescription: - The Priest can bless one player, protecting them from one werewolf attack.
UIPriest.choosePlayerDescription: Select one player to bless and protect them.

UIWitch.roleDescription: The Witch can save a player from death or choose to kill a player once per game.
UIWitch.chooseSaveDescription: Select one player to save from death.

UIAlphaWerewolf.roleDescription: The Alpha Werewolf can convert one villager into a Werewolf each night.
UIAlphaWerewolf.chooseDescription: Select one player to convert into a Werewolf.
UIAlphaWerewolf.confirmDescription: Are you sure you want to convert {{playerName}} into a Werewolf?
UIAlphaWerewolf.successDescription: {{playerName}} has been converted into a Werewolf!

UICupid.roleDescription: Wake up Cupid. Choose two players to bond with each other. If one dies, the other dies as well.
UICupid.chooseFirstDescription: Select the first player to bond.
UICupid.chooseSecondDescription: Select the second player to bond.
UICupid.confirmDescription: Do you want to bond {{player1}} and {{player2}}?
UICupid.successDescription: {{player1}} and {{player2}} are now bonded by Cupid for the rest of the game!

NightBottomSheet.cupidMessage: {{playerName}} is bonded by the Cupid with {{bondedName}}. Both have been selected for elimination.
NightBottomSheet.hunterMessage: The Hunter gets to eliminate another player.

confirmElimination.title: Ready for the Day?
confirmElimination.message: Players: {{names}} will be removed from the game.
confirmElimination.noElimination: No players will be removed from the game.
confirmElimination.cursedVillagerMessage: {{name}} was a Cursed Villager and has now transformed into a Werewolf!

dayTime.title: Day Time
dayTime.description1: The Village has 5 minutes to decide whether they can agree on a player to vote out.
dayTime.description2: There needs to be at least half of the Village to agree on a single person in order for that person to be voted out.
dayTime.hunterEliminatedMessage: The Hunter gets to eliminate another player.
dayTime.princeProtectedMessage: The Prince cannot be removed during the day as the Village cannot vote him out.

confirmElimination.willBeRemoved: will be removed from the game.
confirmElimination.noPlayersRemoved: No players will be removed from the game.
confirmElimination.wolfCubMessage: The Wolf Cub has been killed. Werewolves get an extra kill next night. Don't let the Village know that there was a Wolf Cub killed, simply let the Werewolves eliminate another player.

winningScreen.villageVictoryDescription: Congratulations to the whole Village for figuring out who the bad guys are. You were able to successfully eliminate all of them in this game.
winningScreen.werewolvesVictoryDescription: Great job Werewolves, you were able to successfully eliminate the Village and be unrecognized in doing so.
winningScreen.tannerVictoryDescription: The Tanner has been eliminated! The Tanner wins for achieving their goal of being voted out by the Village.
